body:
Thanks Mostapha,

Yes, we discussed the RadiantTempMap before. It was related to the model tolerance. But i don't think it is the problem now, because what i wrote above.

As for point 2. Let's take for example the zone named "Core". It is the 3 in the list of the names at point 1 in file (the same for all other properties there). But it is the second in the brep list. It is like all zones are shifted by one, geometries and properties. I just played wit the order so it will fit.

-A.
